lines.text: Now I will kill you until you die from it!

[narrating]
Somebody once wrote, "Hell is the impossibility of reason." Well, that's what this place feels like - hell. I hate it already and it's only been a few hours. I'm so tired. We get up at four in the morning...

[narrating]
At first I thought they handed me the wrong dossier. I couldn't believe they wanted this man dead. Third Generation West Point, top of his class, Airbourne, Korea, about a thousand decorations, etc, etc...

[as their boats pass each other]
I loved you in Wall Street.
What are you reading?
Great Expectations.
Is it any good?
It's not what I'd hoped for.
Colonel, who are they?
She's CIA. The other man's an extra.
Cookie?
No, thank you, sir.
Young lady?
No, thank you, sir.
No, I was just offering him a young lady.
President Benson, where's your first lady?
I don't know. I've had lots of women. Lost my flower at the age of 15. I can't keep track.
I'm not saying I don't trust you, and I'm not saying I do. But I don't.
[as they jump out of an airplane one by one]
Geronimo!
Geronimo!
Me!
I had to come. It was a sequel.
These men have taken a supreme vow of celibacy, like their fathers, and their fathers before them...
I can see you're no stranger to pain.
I've been married.
Ah.
*Twice*.
Oy!
Ramada, I want to be with you. I want to hold you. I want to meet your parents and pet your dog...
My parents are dead, Topper. My dog ate them.
President Benson.
No you're not. I've seen him on TV. An older man, about my height.
Mr. President, this is Topper Harley.
Topper Harley, of course, the son I never had. No wonder I didn't recognize you then.
Here's the target area.
That's Minnesota, sir.
Damn it, man, that's the genius of my plan. Why go over there to fight? We can do it right here at home, and get in some good fishing while we're at it.
Sir, the enemy is over there.
Then we'll fly them over here. Their families too. We'll teach them to skate... Do I have to think of everything?
music, clog-dancing, WrestleMania. His work has meant so much to so many. And I owe him everything, Topper. Everything.
I'm happy for you, kid. But if you think you can hurt me again, you're wrong. I left my heart in my other pants.

Oh, Ramada, how could you have been so blind? You always too wrapped up in being Miss Perfect College to notice me. Why should you concern yourself with the feelings of one insignificant roommate? One fabulous day, one incredible experience.
I had no idea it meant so much to you.
[Col. Walters looks extremely fascinated by the women's conversation]
I remember that day as if it were yesterday. The exhilaration of experimenting, sharing something so new, so dangerous, so intimate.

[in a deep voice to Ramada]
Go on.
And I'll never forget the look on your face. The way the sweat glistened on your hard body.
[Col. Walters starts to sweat]
Then you tied my ankles. Tighter. Tighter.
[Col. Walters, still sweating, motions for more from Ramada]
But it just wasn't right. It wasn't natural.
[Col. Walters is about to pass out from listening to Ramada]
Bungee-jumping is just too dangerous a sport.

[surprised]
Bungee-jumping? That's it?
War... it's fantastic!
[Dexter is being rescued]
You don't understand. I can't walk... they've tied my shoelaces together.
A knot. Bastards!
I'm putty in your hands.
In my hands, nothing turns to putty.
You're the only one that knows how to get to the copter pad. If I'm not there in 15 minutes, you know what to do.
Yeah, we get the hell out of here!
No! Wait another 15 minutes!
President Benson?
No you're not. He's an older fella, about my height.
Dexter is one of the captives. He's my husband.
You've got to be joking.
"A rabbi, a priest and a minister walk into a bar..."
Okay, okay, he is your husband.

[He is about ready to battle Saddam Hussein]
We'll settle this the old navy way; The first guy to die, LOSES!
I'm married. I was married before you and I ever met. I'm still married today.
You're joking.
I'm not.
You've got to be.
"A horse walks into a bar. The bartender says, 'Why the long face?'"
You are married.
[Addressing a roomful of Japanese businessmen]
It seems like only yesterday I was strafing so many of your homes. Here I am today, begging you not to make such good cars.
Now we have to go in to get the men who went in to get the men who went in to get the men.
In an emotional address at the state capitol Nebraska Governor, Paul Burmaster made a public apology for his state being so flat.
Every time I give an order, it gets screwed up! Plan a reception, wrong hors d'oeuvres. Appoint an ambassador, he leaves the country.
Ramada, I do love you. I've tried to forget you but no matter what, your face is on the tip of my tongue.
They've dicked with the wrong dictator!

It seems there were three bears. And one morning when their porridge was too hot, they went for a walk. And a little blond girl came skipping through the woods... she ate their porridge and she sat in their chairs... she slept in their beds. And when those bears returned and discovered that mess... Do you know what happened then Topper?
No.
That little blond girl get scared. Ran away.
So you're saying is that little blond girl is me. If this is about me coloring my hair...

Know what I'm gonna do if we make it? I'm gonna go back to Eagle River and marry my gal, Edith Mae. Gonna get us a nice little place with a white picket fence. You know the kind. Two-car garage. Maybe a fishing boat. And in 15 years, when they're all paid for... I'll set my charges and blow the shit out of them.
We both know you belong with Dexter. You're part of his work, the thing that keeps him going. I'm no good at being noble, but... do you have any idea what would happen if you stay here with me?

Of course I do. Sex. Wild, free, passionate, unbridled sex. I would fondle you in ways you can't imagine. I would pleasure you at any time, in any place, in any way, for as long as you could possibly desire.
Do you know what its like to have your heart shot out of season and tied to the top of a car? How it feels to be passed like the world's largest kidney stone? Ramada... I don't THINK so.

[Dexter has fallen off a cliff and died]
He really was a wiener.
Sufferin Succotash!
Looks like the upper hand, is on the other foot!

[after Ramada has been shot]
For a moment there, I thought you were...
Gabriella Sabatini? I get that all the time. It must be the nose.

[President Benson throws Saddam a fireplace cleaning tool which lights up like a lightsaber, and his voice changes and sounds like Darth Vader]
I've been waiting for you, Obi-Wan, we meet at last. The circle is now complete, now, I am the master.
Only a master of evil, Saddam.
Your powers are...
[Coughs, then takes a puff of primatine mist and his voice is back to normal]
Your pows are weak, old man, you should not have come.
first guy to die, loses.
There is also something not right. Harbinger, where were you went the boat showed up?
What are you accusing me of?
Nothing, yet. But, I want to you know, I smell a rat.
[Then, a rat appears on Topper's back]
Hey, when you were showing off, I was cutting teeth for some of the best commanders.
Listen, I'm not saying I don't trust you and I'm not saying I do, but I don't.

[Reaching over a picket fence]
It's locked. From the inside.

[Becoming frantic]
We're gonna die and...

[Grabbing Williams by the shirt]
Get a hold of yourself, man!
Blow it.
It's not our property.
Harbinger. I was right, wasn't I? You sabotaged all of the other missions. I find that totally unacceptable.

[Sobbing]
You got me wrong. All this shooting and killing. I can't go on.
[Begins to cry]
Hey, hey rainy face. Let the sun come out, you bad G.I. Joe. Here why don't you give uncle Topper a nice, big blow.

[Blows into Topper's handkerchief]
I'm done.
Atta boy.
[the handkerchief is a bag of snot, and drops it, and hands Harbinger gun and shoots a few Iraqis]
Thank you, Topper. I can kill again, you've given me another reason to live.
Head towards the gate, they'll be plenty of bad guys to shoot along the way.

[glances at Michelle and Asian man]
Who are they?
She's CIA. That man's an extra.
Thank you, Topper. I can kill again! You've given me a reason to live.
Gotcha! Listening at the door, huh? Well, Walters, looks like we've got our saboteur.
That's your wife, sir.
Yeah, so it is. Lavinia. You're looking as lovely as the day we met.
[to Walters]
Find out what she knows.
Of all the missions in all the jungles you had to walk into this one.

[as his men leave]
Kareem of onion! Al Jarreau!

[dazed]
That's right, Cindy. It's twenty three minutes past the hour, and now heres the Buckinghams with "Kind of a Drag"...
[Topper collapses]

[after failing to kill Topper]
Omar Sharif!

On October 15, the President of the United States ordered a covert mission in the Persian Gulf for the purpose of rescuing soldiers taken hostage during Desert Storm. Only a handful of our highest government officials were aware of the operation, as it included an attempt to assasssan... assisss... kill a guy.

[observing Mount Rushmore through view-master]
The Iraqi coast line. My god do those heights look treacherous.
Will we make it in time?
[Voice starts getting higher]
And why did I bring helium instead of air?

[after getting kneed in the crotch by Topper]
You win.
[Falls to the ground]

[while using middle finger to rub side of nose]
They are treating me good here.

[while moving finger toward back of throat]
The food is tasty and nourishing.

[while moving fist in masturbatory motion]
The peaceful leader of this great country has asked me to appeal to you, President Benson, to stop your vicious, imperialistic tactics around the world.
